name: 20 Second Choppy Chop
description:
Choppy McChopperson's 20 Second Winter Survival Game is a game I made for the 20 second Game Jam in November of 2022.

Directions

use the left and right arrows OR tap the left and right side of the screen to move choppy and avoid branches while chopping wood

The purpose of this game is to chop as much wood as you can before winter starts.

Once your 20 seconds is up snow will start falling.

Did you chop enough wood to survive this winter?

stick around in the end scene to find out ;)
